snippet: The United Nations said it would consider a report asserting that insufficient attention is paid to corruption among its troops, but it challenged the methodology used by the authors.
abstract: United Nations says it will consider report by Transparency International UK alleging that it does not pay enough attention to preventing corrupt behavior by its peacekeepers; UN spokesman Farhan Haq also challenges methodology used by report's authors.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations said it would consider a report asserting that insufficient attention is paid to corruption among its troops, but it challenged the methodology used by the authors.

headline.main: U.N. Questions Criticism of Its Peacekeepers
headline.print_headline: U.N. Questions Criticism of Its Peacekeepers

keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations
keywords.name: organizations
